variable.name: group_id
variable.description: ID for matched groups of case and its matched controls

variable.name: prior_chemo
variable.comment:
Matching variable:
Perfect match = matched by chemotherapy
Optimal match = not matched by chemotherapy

variable.name: age
variable.comment:
Matching variable:
Perfect match = +/- 5 years
Optimal match = +/- 10 years

variable.name: institute
variable.comment: Multiple institute ID's used (values not listed out)

variable.name: ecog
variable.description: Baseline ECOG (Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group) performance status
variable.comment:
ECOG Performance StatusThese scales and criteria are used by doctors and researchers to assess how a patient's disease is progressing, assess how the disease affects the daily living abilities of the patient, and determine appropriate treatment and prognosis. They are included here for health care professionals to access.
ECOG Grade:
0 = Fully active, able to carry on all pre-disease performance without restriction
1 = Restricted in physically strenuous activity but ambulatory and able to carry out work of a light or sedentary nature, e.g., light house work, office work
2 = Ambulatory and capable of all self care but unable to carry out any work activities. Up and about more than 50% of waking hours
3 = Capable of only limited self care, confined to bed or chair more than 50% of waking hours
4 = Completely disabled. Cannot carry on any self care. Totally confined to bed or chair
5 = Dead
Oken, M.M., Creech, R.H., Tormey, D.C., Horton, J., Davis, T.E., McFadden, E.T., Carbone, P.P.: Toxicity And Response Criteria Of The Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group. Am J Clin Oncol 5:649-655, 1982.PMID: 7165009
variable.value: Capable of only limited self care

variable.name: validity
variable.comment:
Validity of Control:
1 = valid control
0 = control had MSK after initial matching, definite exclusion
2 = control had MSK after initial matching, possibly OK to include.
Validity of Case:
2 cases are now questionable, because one case went off treatment, but
returned to trial therapy; one case has questionable MSK event:
1 = valid case
2 = questionable validity
